changeinfo.changes:
- The PSP mini to install this time is Sazuke vs Commander duplicating Mr.gas and Major_Tom fake download.
- Hability to clone any PSP game.
- It tells you if the bubble to clone has a pboot.pbp installed.
- Allows to remove the pboot.pbp from the clone (if you need a clean bubble).

- Now you can select how many clones you want to create for each gamebase (1 to 9).
- Clean code.
